title: Welcome
content:
Welcome to DocX

This is your first page. Use this space to capture notes, plans, or documentation. Below are a few quick tips to get started:

Editing Basics

  • Formatting: Use the toolbar above (bold, italic, underline, lists).
  • Links & Images: Click the link or image icons to insert.
  • Code & Tables: Insert rows/cols with the +Row / +Col buttons.
  • Tasks: Type [] or use the task list button for checkboxes.

Pages & Folders

  • Create new pages or folders from the left sidebar.
  • Drag & drop pages to reorder or move them into folders.
  • Doubleâ€‘click a title in the tree to rename.

Search & History

  • Press Ctrl/Cmd+K to search across pages.
  • Version history captures snapshots every minute; open the clock icon to restore.

Comments

Select text and use the comment icon to leave contextual feedback.

Next Steps

  1. Create a "Roadmap" folder and add pages inside.
  2. Draft your first specification in a new page.
  3. Explore dark mode with the toggle in the top right.

Happy documenting! ðŸŽ‰
